body: female ntr is no worse because girls can pick and choose, there will always be a guy wanting to fuck her, man has to win woman, he has to go a stupidly long way for a girl to like him, and that is easily broken by someone with a bigger dick, female ntr, is not so painful because the girl didn't have to go a long way to win the guy

So apparently, standard female NTR merely warrants a few pages ( they may be full color pages, but still ... ) where as male NTR has a whole chapter committed to it to display what's going down.  Does that seem odd to anyone else?
